arts.ttl: Late Mert Kömür stunner salvages draw for Augsburg against dominant St. Pauli
arts.sum: St. Pauli and Augsburg drew 1-1 in a tense Bundesliga clash, Mert Kömür's late stunner secured a point for Augsburg after Noahkai Banks' own-goal had put St. Pauli ahead early on. The Bundesliga clash between St. Pauli and Augsburg at the Millerntor-Stadion was preceded by a poignant Remembrance Day ceremony, setting the tone for a match that would prove to be as much about resilience as it was about football.

arts.ttl: 15:30 Kickoffs: Bayern avoid late scare, Augsburg snatch late point, away wins for Gladbach, Dortmund and Freiburg
arts.sum: In the 15:30 kickoffs on Bundesliga matchweek 20, pace-setters Bayern München avoided a late scare against Holstein Kiel, Borussia Mönchengladbach, Borussia Dortmund and Freiburg secured respective wins on the road, whilst Augsburg picked up a point on the road against St. Pauli.

arts.ttl: Official | St. Pauli confirm Siebe van der Heyden as fourth new January arrival
arts.sum: Hamburg's FC St. Pauli officially confirmed their fourth winter arrival yesterday.

arts.ttl: St. Pauli vs Augsburg preview: In-form sides go head to head in Hamburg
arts.sum: With both sides in good form, St. Pauli take on Augsburg at Millerntor-Stadion this weekend, with the hosts looking to build on last weekend's emphatic win against Union Berlin on home soil.

arts.ttl: Preview: St Pauli vs. Augsburg - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between St Pauli and Augsburg, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
